line_2: And Joy distract, and Sorrow kill.

line_2: The blue mist hovering round the gelid hill;
For if life and strength be in him still,

line_1: "I faint! — I fall! — ah, me! — sensations chill
line_2: "Shoot through my bones, my shuddering bosom thrill!

line_2: I've seen when Evening on yon hill

line_1: NATURE, whilst Fears her bosom chill,
line_2: Suspends her Pow'rs, and LIFE stands still.

line_2: Calls us all to Mr. GILL,

line_2: Thro' his frozen blood doth thrill,
